arts.ttl: Manchester City will be without another attacking weapon against Brighton
arts.sum: Manchester City will take on Brighton today at the Amex Stadium with several attacking players ruled out of the match due to injury. Savinho and Rayan Cherki are ruled out of today’s match. It has been reported that Phil Foden will also miss the match against Brighton. Pep Guardiola’s side will have to beat Fabian […] The post Manchester City will be without another attacking weapon against Brighton appeared first on Esteemed Kompany.

arts.ttl: Manchester City XI vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester City travel to Brighton on Sunday, aiming to bounce back immediately from a chastening 2-0 home defeat to Tottenham. Pep Guardiola’s side cannot afford to lose more ground, with title rivals Liverpool and Arsenal meeting later in the day. arts.ttl: Brighton vs Manchester City – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Brighton welcome Manchester City to the Amex Stadium on Sunday, with both sides looking to bounce back from disappointing league results last weekend. After a sobering defeat at Everton, Brighton responded with a midweek cup thrashing of Oxford United. Meanwhile, Manchester City are aiming to recover from a surprise home loss to Tottenham. arts.ttl: Brighton vs Manchester City – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton host Manchester City on Sunday in a fascinating Premier League encounter, with manager Fabian Hürzeler looking to extend his personal unbeaten record against Pep Guardiola.
